properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nothing either great or small
Nothing sinner no
Jesus did it did it all
Long long ago

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
It is finished
Yes indeed
Finished ev'ry jot
Sinner this is all you need
Tell me is it not

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When He from His lofty throne
Stooped to do and die
Ev'ry thing was fully done
Listen to His cry

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Weary working burdened one
Why do you toil so
Cease your doing all was done
Long long ago

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Till to Jesus' work you cling
By a simple faith
Doing is a deadly thing
Doing ends in death

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Cast your deadly doing down
Down at Jesus' feet
Stand in Him in Him alone
Gloriously complete
